column4: hi, i have no System -> Administration -> Restricted Drivers Manager. And nvidia drivers is not an option in System -> Administration -> Hardware Drivers --- how do i install the nvidia drivers?
envyng is easier, latest drivers are available from hp of manufacturer, often
im little busy now, but can tell you already its suported
oh yeah i know it is, it was working in 7.04 :)
i have a 7.10 one, i can make an 8.04 but it will take a while
: quick n dirty idea would be to take the section from xorg.conf, but will look up nvidia, now
seems to me i should be more concerned about the fact i can't modprobe nvidia module before trying to configure x
i got it working by building from source manually anyway.. thanks for your help (now my sound is broken :)
